mapper.sql: id, biz_id, seal_car_code, operate_site_id, product_type, should_scan_count, actual_scan_count, intercept_should_scan_count, intercept_actual_scan_count, intercept_not_scan_count, more_scan_local_count, more_scan_out_count, more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count, create_time, yn, ts, board_code, actual_scan_waybill_count, total_scanned_board_count, total_seal_waybill_count, total_scanned_waybill_count, total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count, total_should_intercept_waybill_count, total_more_scan_local_waybill_count, total_more_scan_out_waybill_count
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jy_unload_aggs (id, biz_id, seal_car_code, operate_site_id, product_type, should_scan_count, actual_scan_count, intercept_should_scan_count, intercept_actual_scan_count, intercept_not_scan_count, more_scan_local_count, more_scan_out_count, more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count, create_time, yn) VALUES (#{id}, #{bizId}, #{sealCarCode}, #{operateSiteId}, #{productType}, #{shouldScanCount}, #{actualScanCount}, #{interceptShouldScanCount}, #{interceptActualScanCount}, #{interceptNotScanCount}, #{moreScanLocalCount}, #{moreScanOutCount}, #{moreScanTotalCount}, #{totalSealPackageCount}, #{totalScannedPackageCount}, NOW(), 1)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 AND biz_id = #{bizId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM(should_scan_count) should_scan_count, SUM(actual_scan_count) actual_scan_count, SUM(intercept_should_scan_count) intercept_should_scan_count, SUM(intercept_actual_scan_count) intercept_actual_scan_count, SUM(more_scan_local_count) more_scan_local_count, SUM(more_scan_out_count) more_scan_out_count, sum(more_scan_total_count) more_scan_total_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count FROM jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 and biz_id = #{bizId}
and board_code =#{boardCode}

SELECT SUM(should_scan_count) should_scan_count, SUM(actual_scan_count) actual_scan_count, SUM(more_scan_local_count) more_scan_local_count, SUM(more_scan_out_count) more_scan_out_count FROM jy_unload_aggs WHERE yn = 1 and biz_id = #{bizId}

SELECT total_seal_waybill_count, total_scanned_waybill_count, total_should_intercept_waybill_count, total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count, total_more_scan_local_waybill_count, total_more_scan_out_waybill_count, total_seal_package_count, total_scanned_package_count FROM jy_unload_aggs WHERE biz_id = #{bizId} and yn = 1 limit 1
mapper.update:
update jy_unload_aggs set
seal_car_code = #{sealCarCode},
should_scan_count = #{shouldScanCount},
should_scan_waybill_count = #{shouldScanWaybillCount},
actual_scan_count = #{actualScanCount},
intercept_should_scan_count = #{interceptShouldScanCount},
intercept_actual_scan_count = #{interceptActualScanCount},
intercept_not_scan_count = #{interceptNotScanCount},
more_scan_local_count = #{moreScanLocalCount},
more_scan_out_count = #{moreScanOutCount},
more_scan_total_count = #{moreScanTotalCount},
total_seal_package_count = #{totalSealPackageCount},
total_scanned_package_count = #{totalScannedPackageCount},
actual_scan_waybill_count = #{actualScanWaybillCount},
total_seal_waybill_count = #{totalSealWaybillCount},
total_scanned_waybill_count = #{totalScannedWaybillCount},
total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count = #{totalScannedInterceptWaybillCount},
total_should_intercept_waybill_count = #{totalShouldInterceptWaybillCount},
total_more_scan_local_waybill_count = #{totalMoreScanLocalWaybillCount},
total_more_scan_out_waybill_count = #{totalMoreScanOutWaybillCount},
total_scanned_board_count = #{totalScannedBoardCount}
where biz_id = #{bizId} and product_type = #{productType} and board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO jy_unload_aggs (biz_id,
seal_car_code,
operate_site_id,
product_type,
board_code,
should_scan_count,
should_scan_waybill_count,
actual_scan_count,
intercept_should_scan_count,
intercept_actual_scan_count,
intercept_not_scan_count,
more_scan_local_count,
more_scan_out_count,
more_scan_total_count,
total_seal_package_count,
total_scanned_package_count,
actual_scan_waybill_count,
total_seal_waybill_count,
total_scanned_waybill_count,
total_scanned_intercept_waybill_count,
total_should_intercept_waybill_count,
total_more_scan_local_waybill_count,
total_more_scan_out_waybill_count,
total_scanned_board_count,
create_time, ts, yn) VALUES (#{bizId},
#{sealCarCode},
#{operateSiteId},
#{productType},
#{boardCode},
#{shouldScanCount},
#{shouldScanWaybillCount},
#{actualScanCount},
#{interceptShouldScanCount},
#{interceptActualScanCount},
#{interceptNotScanCount},
#{moreScanLocalCount},
#{moreScanOutCount},
#{moreScanTotalCount},
#{totalSealPackageCount},
#{totalScannedPackageCount},
#{actualScanWaybillCount},
#{totalSealWaybillCount},
#{totalScannedWaybillCount},
#{totalScannedInterceptWaybillCount},
#{totalShouldInterceptWaybillCount},
#{totalMoreScanLocalWaybillCount},
#{totalMoreScanOutWaybillCount},
#{totalScannedBoardCount},
now(), now(), 1)
